In today's digital age, privacy and security are of the utmost importance. With social media and cloud services becoming ubiquitous, it's easy to forget that not everything should be shared with the world. Most of us have sensitive files like private photos and videos that we don't want others to see. That's where File Hider comes in. File Hider is an excellent app that lets you safely store and hide your personal photos and videos. 

## What is File Hider 

File Hider is an intelligent calculator locker and hider that lets you hide your personal photos, videos, and other files. Unlike other apps that are easy to bypass or break, File Hider is specifically designed to protect your privacy and keep your sensitive files safe. 

## How it Works

The app is designed to look and operate like a regular calculator app, but with a secret twist. When you open the app and enter your password, it unlocks the hidden vault where you can store your sensitive files. The calculator aspect also adds an extra layer of security because anyone who manages to get into your phone won't even know that it exists. 

## Features

Here are some of the top features of File Hider:

- Intelligent calculator locker and hider that looks and operates like a regular calculator
- Hide photos, videos, documents, and other files
- Two layers of authentication to keep your files safe
- Free version available with basic features
- Premium version allows you to back up your files to the cloud
- The app is lightweight, fast, and easy to use

## Advantages of Using File Hider

File Hider is an excellent way to protect your privacy and keep your sensitive files safe. Here are some of the top advantages of using File Hider:

- Keep personal photos and videos private
- Protect sensitive documents and files
- Prevent unauthorized access to your files
- No one will know the app exists
- No need to worry about accidentally showing private files while showing photos to friends or family

## Conclusion

File Hider is an excellent app to keep your personal photos, videos, and other files private and secure. With its intelligent calculator locker and hider, the app keeps your sensitive files safe from prying eyes. The app is lightweight, fast, and easy to use, making it an ideal solution for those who want to protect their privacy. If you're looking for an app that can keep your personal files safe, then File Hider is definitely worth checking out.
